abstract: Editorial warns Republican efforts to weaken Affordable Care Act of 2010 for ideological reasons would also undermine efforts to detect and punish Medicare fraud; notes Medicare Fraud Strike Force has been increasingly successful in punishing those who commit fraud, in part due to $350 million in funding under Obamacare.

headline.print_headline: Fraud and Other Threats to Medicare
headline.main: Fraud and Other Threats to Medicare

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Weakening Obamacare would weaken the fight against Medicare fraud and, in the process, damage the quality of care....
lead_paragraph: Weakening Obamacare would weaken the fight against Medicare fraud and, in the process, damage the quality of care.
